DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men 1 Past 6 Months Can Get and Keep Erection Confidence Rating Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how they would rate their confidence that they could get and keep an erection, using a 5 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Past 6 Months Confidence Can Get and Keep Erection Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._A question to rate the confidence of an individual with regard to getting and keeping an erection._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Concepts.definition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research.

Property.preferredName: Past 6 Months Confidence Can Get and Keep Erection Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.:A question to rate the confidence of an individual with regard to getting and keeping an erection.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

Concepts.longName: Confidence Can Get and Keep Erection
Concepts.definition: A question to rate the confidence of an individual with regard to getting and keeping an erection.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating a very low level of confidence or an absence.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating a very low level of confidence or an absence.
